Constructor Detail

Robot

public Robot(java.lang.String portName)
Creates a new instance of Robot and connects to the Robot. This initiates the serial port and prepares the robot to transmit and recieve data.

Parameters:
portName - the name of the serial port to connect to. (i.e. "/dev/ttyUSB0")
Method Detail

setLeftWheelSpeed

public boolean setLeftWheelSpeed(int speed)
Sets the speed of the left wheel

Parameters:
speed - the speed ranging from -100 to +100
Returns:
true if reasonable speed, false if not or false if couldn't send command.

setRightWheelSpeed

public boolean setRightWheelSpeed(int speed)
Sets the speed of the right wheel

Parameters:
speed - the speed ranging from -100 to +100
Returns:
true if reasonable speed, false if not or false if couldn't send command

setServo1

public boolean setServo1(int position)
Sets the position of Servo 1

Parameters:
position - position of the servo in degrees ranging from -90 to 90 where 0 is directly forward and positive is to the right.
Returns:
true if reasonable position, false if not or false if couldn't send command

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Disconnects the robot
